mapper.select: select station_name, case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(pass)/sum(input),4) end as Rate from autofloor_rate where start_time >=sysdate -2/24 and start_time <sysdate and floor=#{floor_name} and product=#{product_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by station_name order by station_name

select station_name, case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(pass)/sum(input),4) end as Rate from autofloor_rate where start_time >= to_date('${rate_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and start_time < to_date('${rate_Time} 10:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and floor=#{floor_name} and product=#{product_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by station_name order by station_name

select station_name, case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(pass)/sum(input),4) end as Rate from autofloor_rate where start_time >= to_date('${rate_Time} 20:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and start_time < to_date('${rate_Time} 22:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and floor=#{floor_name} and product=#{product_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by station_name order by station_name

select station_name, case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(pass)/sum(input),4) end as Rate from autofloor_rate where start_time >= to_date('${rate_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and start_time < to_date('${rate_Time} 20:30:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and floor=#{floor_name} and product=#{product_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by station_name order by station_name

select station_name, case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(pass)/sum(input),4) end as Rate from autofloor_rate where start_time >= to_date('${start_Time} 20:30:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and start_time < to_date('${end_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and floor=#{floor_name} and product=#{product_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by station_name order by station_name

select station_name, case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(pass)/sum(input),4) end as Rate from autofloor_rate where start_time >= to_date('${start_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and start_time < to_date('${end_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and floor=#{floor_name} and product=#{product_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by station_name order by station_name

select station_name, case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(Retest)/sum(input),4) end as Rate from autofloor_rate where start_time >=sysdate -2/24 and start_time <sysdate and floor=#{floor_name} and product=#{product_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by station_name order by station_name

select station_name, case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(Retest)/sum(input),4) end as Rate from autofloor_rate where start_time >= to_date('${rate_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and start_time < to_date('${rate_Time} 10:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and floor=#{floor_name} and product=#{product_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by station_name order by station_name

select station_name, case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(Retest)/sum(input),4) end as Rate from autofloor_rate where start_time >= to_date('${rate_Time} 20:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and start_time < to_date('${rate_Time} 22:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and floor=#{floor_name} and product=#{product_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by station_name order by station_name

select station_name, case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(Retest)/sum(input),4) end as Rate from autofloor_rate where start_time >= to_date('${rate_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and start_time < to_date('${rate_Time} 20:30:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and floor=#{floor_name} and product=#{product_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by station_name order by station_name

select station_name, case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(Retest)/sum(input),4) end as Rate from autofloor_rate where start_time >= to_date('${start_Time} 20:30:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and start_time < to_date('${end_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and floor=#{floor_name} and product=#{product_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by station_name order by station_name

select station_name, case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(Retest)/sum(input),4) end as Rate from autofloor_rate where start_time >= to_date('${start_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and start_time < to_date('${end_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and floor=#{floor_name} and product=#{product_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by station_name order by station_name

select station_name, case(sum(unknown)+ sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(unknown)/(sum(unknown)+ sum(input)),4) end as Rate from autofloor_rate where start_time >=sysdate -2/24 and start_time <sysdate and floor=#{floor_name} and product=#{product_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by station_name order by station_name

select station_name, case(sum(unknown)+ sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(unknown)/(sum(unknown)+ sum(input)),4) end as Rate from autofloor_rate where start_time >= to_date('${rate_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and start_time < to_date('${rate_Time} 10:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and floor=#{floor_name} and product=#{product_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by station_name order by station_name

select station_name, case(sum(unknown)+ sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(unknown)/(sum(unknown)+ sum(input)),4) end as Rate from autofloor_rate where start_time >= to_date('${rate_Time} 20:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and start_time < to_date('${rate_Time} 22:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and floor=#{floor_name} and product=#{product_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by station_name order by station_name

select station_name, case(sum(unknown)+ sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(unknown)/(sum(unknown)+ sum(input)),4) end as Rate from autofloor_rate where start_time >= to_date('${rate_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and start_time < to_date('${rate_Time} 20:30:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and floor= #{floor_name} and product= #{product_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by station_name order by station_name

select station_name, case(sum(unknown)+ sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(unknown)/(sum(unknown)+ sum(input)),4) end as Rate from autofloor_rate where start_time >= to_date('${start_Time} 20:30:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and start_time < to_date('${end_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and floor= #{floor_name} and product= #{product_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by station_name order by station_name

select station_name, case(sum(unknown)+ sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(unknown)/(sum(unknown)+ sum(input)),4) end as Rate from autofloor_rate where start_time >= to_date('${start_Time} 20:30:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and start_time < to_date('${end_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and floor= #{floor_name} and product= #{product_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by station_name order by station_name

select * from (select machine_no,(case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(pass)/sum(input),4)end) - ( case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(retest)/sum(input),4)end) as Zty,sum(fail_count) as Fail_Q from autofloor_rate_machine where start_time >= to_date('${rate_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and start_time < to_date('${rate_Time} 20:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and floor=#{floor_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' and station_name=#{product_name} group by machine_no ORDER BY Fail_Q desc) t where rownum<6 and t.Fail_Q>0

select * from (select machine_no,(case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(pass)/sum(input),4)end) - ( case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(retest)/sum(input),4)end) as Zty,sum(fail_count) as Fail_Q from autofloor_rate_machine where start_time >= to_date('${rate_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and start_time < to_date('${rate_Time} 10:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and floor=#{floor_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' and station_name=#{product_name} group by machine_no ORDER BY Fail_Q desc) t where rownum<6 and t.Fail_Q>0

select * from (select machine_no,(case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(pass)/sum(input),4)end) - ( case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(retest)/sum(input),4)end) as Zty,sum(fail_count) as Fail_Q from autofloor_rate_machine where start_time >= to_date('${rate_Time} 20:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and start_time < to_date('${rate_Time} 22:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and floor=#{floor_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' and station_name=#{product_name} group by machine_no ORDER BY Fail_Q desc) t where rownum<6 and t.Fail_Q>0

select * from (select machine_no,(case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(pass)/sum(input),4)end) - ( case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(retest)/sum(input),4)end) as Zty,sum(fail_count) as Fail_Q from autofloor_rate_machine where start_time >= to_date('${rate_Time} 20:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and start_time < to_date('${end_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and floor=#{floor_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' and station_name=#{product_name} group by machine_no ORDER BY Fail_Q desc) t where rownum<6 and t.Fail_Q>0

select * from (select machine_no,(case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(pass)/sum(input),4)end) - ( case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(retest)/sum(input),4)end) as Zty,sum(fail_count) as Fail_Q from autofloor_rate_machine where start_time >= to_date('${rate_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and start_time < to_date('${end_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and floor=#{floor_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' and station_name=#{product_name} group by machine_no ORDER BY Fail_Q desc) t where rownum<6 and t.Fail_Q>0

select * from (select machine_no,(case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(pass)/sum(input),4)end) - ( case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(retest)/sum(input),4)end) as Zty,sum(fail_count) as Fail_Q from autofloor_rate_machine where start_time >=sysdate -2/24 and start_time <sysdate and floor=#{floor_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' and station_name=#{product_name} group by machine_no ORDER BY Fail_Q desc) t where rownum<6 and t.Fail_Q>0

select * from (select fail_item,count(*)as fail_qty from (select t.out_station_time,t.sn,t.fail_item from (select a.*,row_number() over(partition by a.sn order by a.out_station_time desc) rw from autofloor_wip a where out_station_time >=sysdate -2/24 and out_station_time <sysdate and line_name = #{line_name} and machine_no=#{machine_no} and test_result =1 ) t where t.rw=1 )m group by fail_item order by fail_qty desc ) where rownum<6

select * from (select fail_item,count(*)as fail_qty from (select t.out_station_time,t.sn,t.fail_item from (select a.*,row_number() over(partition by a.sn order by a.out_station_time desc) rw from autofloor_wip a where out_station_time >= to_date('${rate_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and out_station_time < to_date('${rate_Time} 20:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and line_name = #{line_name} and machine_no=#{machine_no} and test_result =1 ) t where t.rw=1 )m group by fail_item order by fail_qty desc ) where rownum<6

select * from (select fail_item,count(*)as fail_qty from (select t.out_station_time,t.sn,t.fail_item from (select a.*,row_number() over(partition by a.sn order by a.out_station_time desc) rw from autofloor_wip a where out_station_time >= to_date('${rate_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and out_station_time < to_date('${rate_Time} 10:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and line_name = #{line_name} and machine_no=#{machine_no} and test_result =1 ) t where t.rw=1 )m group by fail_item order by fail_qty desc ) where rownum<6

select * from (select fail_item,count(*)as fail_qty from (select t.out_station_time,t.sn,t.fail_item from (select a.*,row_number() over(partition by a.sn order by a.out_station_time desc) rw from autofloor_wip a where out_station_time >= to_date('${rate_Time} 20:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and out_station_time < to_date('${rate_Time} 22:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and line_name = #{line_name} and machine_no=#{machine_no} and test_result =1 ) t where t.rw=1 )m group by fail_item order by fail_qty desc ) where rownum<6

select * from (select fail_item,count(*)as fail_qty from (select t.out_station_time,t.sn,t.fail_item from (select a.*,row_number() over(partition by a.sn order by a.out_station_time desc) rw from autofloor_wip a where out_station_time >= to_date('${rate_Time} 20:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and out_station_time < to_date('${end_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and line_name = #{line_name} and machine_no=#{machine_no} and test_result =1 ) t where t.rw=1 )m group by fail_item order by fail_qty desc ) where rownum<6

select * from (select fail_item,count(*)as fail_qty from (select t.out_station_time,t.sn,t.fail_item from (select a.*,row_number() over(partition by a.sn order by a.out_station_time desc) rw from autofloor_wip a where out_station_time >= to_date('${rate_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and out_station_time < to_date('${end_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and line_name = #{line_name} and machine_no=#{machine_no} and test_result =1 ) t where t.rw=1 )m group by fail_item order by fail_qty desc ) where rownum<6

select sum(w.cont) from (select count(*)as cont from (select t.out_station_time,t.sn,t.fail_item from (select a.*,row_number() over(partition by a.sn order by a.out_station_time desc) rw from autofloor_wip a where out_station_time >= to_date('${rate_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and out_station_time < to_date('${rate_Time} 20:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and line_name = #{line_name} and machine_no=#{machine_no} and test_result =1 ) t where t.rw=1 )m group by fail_item order by cont desc )w where rownum<6

select sum(w.cont) from (select count(*)as cont from (select t.out_station_time,t.sn,t.fail_item from (select a.*,row_number() over(partition by a.sn order by a.out_station_time desc) rw from autofloor_wip a where out_station_time >= to_date('${rate_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and out_station_time < to_date('${rate_Time} 10:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and line_name = #{line_name} and machine_no=#{machine_no} and test_result =1 ) t where t.rw=1 )m group by fail_item order by cont desc )w where rownum<6

select sum(w.cont) from (select count(*)as cont from (select t.out_station_time,t.sn,t.fail_item from (select a.*,row_number() over(partition by a.sn order by a.out_station_time desc) rw from autofloor_wip a where out_station_time >= to_date('${rate_Time} 20:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and out_station_time < to_date('${rate_Time} 22:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and line_name = #{line_name} and machine_no=#{machine_no} and test_result =1 ) t where t.rw=1 )m group by fail_item order by cont desc )w where rownum<6

select sum(w.cont) from (select count(*)as cont from (select t.out_station_time,t.sn,t.fail_item from (select a.*,row_number() over(partition by a.sn order by a.out_station_time desc) rw from autofloor_wip a where out_station_time >=sysdate -2/24 and out_station_time <sysdate and line_name = #{line_name} and machine_no=#{machine_no} and test_result =1 ) t where t.rw=1 )m group by fail_item order by cont desc )w where rownum<6

select sum(w.cont) from (select count(*)as cont from (select t.out_station_time,t.sn,t.fail_item from (select a.*,row_number() over(partition by a.sn order by a.out_station_time desc) rw from autofloor_wip a where out_station_time >= to_date('${rate_Time} 20:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and out_station_time < to_date('${end_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and line_name =#{line_name} and machine_no=#{machine_no} and test_result =1 ) t where t.rw=1 )m group by fail_item order by cont desc )w where rownum<6

select sum(w.cont) from (select count(*)as cont from (select t.out_station_time,t.sn,t.fail_item from (select a.*,row_number() over(partition by a.sn order by a.out_station_time desc) rw from autofloor_wip a where out_station_time >= to_date('${rate_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and out_station_time < to_date('${end_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and line_name =#{line_name} and machine_no=#{machine_no} and test_result =1 ) t where t.rw=1 )m group by fail_item order by cont desc )w where rownum<6

select station_name,sum(input) as input,sum(pass) as pass from autofloor_rate where start_time >=sysdate -2/24 and start_time <sysdate and floor=#{floor_name} and product=#{product_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by station_name

select station_name, sum(input) as input,sum(pass) as pass from autofloor_rate where start_time >= to_date('${rate_Time} 20:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and start_time < to_date('${end_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and floor=#{floor_name} and product=#{product_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by station_name

select station_name, sum(input) as input,sum(pass) as pass from autofloor_rate where start_time >= to_date('${rate_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and start_time < to_date('${end_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and floor=#{floor_name} and product=#{product_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by station_name

select station_name,sum(input) as input,sum(pass) as pass from autofloor_rate where start_time >= to_date('${rate_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and start_time < to_date('${rate_Time} 20:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and floor=#{floor_name} and product=#{product_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by station_name

select station_name,sum(input) as input,sum(pass) as pass from autofloor_rate where START_TIME between to_date('${rate_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date('${rate_Time} 10:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and floor=#{floor_name} and product=#{product_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by station_name

select station_name,sum(input) as input,sum(pass) as pass from autofloor_rate where START_TIME between to_date('${rate_Time} 20:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date('${rate_Time} 22:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and floor=#{floor_name} and product=#{product_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by station_name

select * from (select line_name,machine_no,sum(input) as input,sum(pass) as pass,sum(fail_count) as ttl_fail,sum(fail) as fail,sum(retest) as retest,sum(unknown) as Unknown, case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(pass)/sum(input),4) end as Yield, case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(Retest)/sum(input),4) end as Misdetet, case(sum(unknown)+ sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(unknown)/(sum(unknown)+ sum(input)),4) end as unknownRate, case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(FIRST_PASS)/(sum(input)),4) end as FPY from autofloor_rate_machine where start_time >=sysdate -2/24 and start_time <sysdate and floor=#{floor_name} and STATION_NAME=#{product_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by line_name,machine_no order by FPY ASC)T where rownum<6

select * from (select line_name,machine_no,sum(input) as input,sum(pass) as pass,sum(fail_count) as ttl_fail,sum(fail) as fail,sum(retest) as retest,sum(unknown) as Unknown, case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(pass)/sum(input),4) end as Yield, case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(Retest)/sum(input),4) end as Misdetet, case(sum(unknown)+ sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(unknown)/(sum(unknown)+ sum(input)),4) end as unknownRate, case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(FIRST_PASS)/(sum(input)),4) end as FPY from autofloor_rate_machine where start_time >= to_date('${rate_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and start_time < to_date('${rate_Time} 20:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and floor=#{floor_name} and STATION_NAME=#{product_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by line_name,machine_no order by FPY ASC)T where rownum<6

select * from (select line_name,machine_no,sum(input) as input,sum(pass) as pass,sum(fail_count) as ttl_fail,sum(fail) as fail,sum(retest) as retest,sum(unknown) as Unknown, case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(pass)/sum(input),4) end as Yield, case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(Retest)/sum(input),4) end as Misdetet, case(sum(unknown)+ sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(unknown)/(sum(unknown)+ sum(input)),4) end as unknownRate, case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(FIRST_PASS)/(sum(input)),4) end as FPY from autofloor_rate_machine where start_time >= to_date('${start_Time} 20:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and start_time < to_date('${end_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and floor=#{floor_name} and STATION_NAME=#{product_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by line_name,machine_no order by FPY ASC)T where rownum<6

select * from (select line_name,machine_no,sum(input) as input,sum(pass) as pass,sum(fail_count) as ttl_fail,sum(fail) as fail,sum(retest) as retest,sum(unknown) as Unknown, case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(pass)/sum(input),4) end as Yield, case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(Retest)/sum(input),4) end as Misdetet, case(sum(unknown)+ sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(unknown)/(sum(unknown)+ sum(input)),4) end as unknownRate, case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(FIRST_PASS)/(sum(input)),4) end as FPY from autofloor_rate_machine where start_time >= to_date('${start_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and start_time < to_date('${end_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and floor=#{floor_name} and STATION_NAME=#{product_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by line_name,machine_no order by FPY ASC)T where rownum<6

select * from (select line_name,machine_no,sum(input) as input,sum(pass) as pass,sum(fail_count) as ttl_fail,sum(fail) as fail,sum(retest) as retest,sum(unknown) as Unknown, case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(pass)/sum(input),4) end as Yield, case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(Retest)/sum(input),4) end as Misdetet, case(sum(unknown)+ sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(unknown)/(sum(unknown)+ sum(input)),4) end as unknownRate, case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(FIRST_PASS)/(sum(input)),4) end as FPY from autofloor_rate_machine where START_TIME >= to_date('${rate_Time} 08:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and START_TIME < to_date('${rate_Time} 10:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and floor=#{floor_name} and STATION_NAME=#{product_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by line_name,machine_no order by FPY ASC)T where rownum<6

select * from (select line_name,machine_no,sum(input) as input,sum(pass) as pass,sum(fail_count) as ttl_fail,sum(fail) as fail,sum(retest) as retest,sum(unknown) as Unknown, case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(pass)/sum(input),4) end as Yield, case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(Retest)/sum(input),4) end as Misdetet, case(sum(unknown)+ sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(unknown)/(sum(unknown)+ sum(input)),4) end as unknownRate, case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(FIRST_PASS)/(sum(input)),4) end as FPY from autofloor_rate_machine where START_TIME >= to_date('${rate_Time} 20:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and START_TIME < to_date('${rate_Time} 22:30:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and floor=#{floor_name} and STATION_NAME=#{product_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by line_name,machine_no order by FPY ASC)T where rownum<6

select LINE_NAME||MACHINE_NO as stationname ,case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(Retest)/sum(input),4) end as misdetet from AUTOFLOOR_RATE_MACHINE where START_TIME >= to_date('${rate_Time} 00:00:00','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and END_TIME < to_date('${end_Time} 23:59:59','YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') and FLOOR=#{floor_name} group by LINE_NAME||MACHINE_NO

select LINE_NAME||MACHINE_NO as stationname ,case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(Retest)/sum(input),4) end as misdetet from AUTOFLOOR_RATE_MACHINE where START_TIME >= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR (sysdate-7,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') and END_TIME <= sysdate and FLOOR=#{floor_name} group by LINE_NAME||MACHINE_NO

select LINE_NAME||MACHINE_NO as stationname ,case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(Retest)/sum(input),4) end as misdetet from AUTOFLOOR_RATE_MACHINE where START_TIME >= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR (sysdate-30,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') and END_TIME <= sysdate and FLOOR=#{floor_name} group by LINE_NAME||MACHINE_NO

select ROWNUM,t.* from (select machine_no,(case(sum(input)) when 0 then 0.00 else round(sum(retest)/sum(input),4)end) as rate from autofloor_rate_machine where start_time >=sysdate -2/24 and start_time <sysdate and floor=#{floor_name} and line_name like #{line_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME like #{product_name}||'%' and STATION_NAME!=' ' group by machine_no ORDER BY rate desc) t where rownum<6
mapper.insert:
insert into AUTOFLOOR_RATE
ID,
FLOOR,
LINE_NAME,
PRODUCT,
STATION_NAME,
INPUT,
PASS,
FAIL,
RETEST,
UNKNOWN,
FIRST_PASS,
START_TIME,
END_TIME,
TIME_SLOT,
UPDATE_TIME,
#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{floor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{product,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{stationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{input,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{pass,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{fail,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{retest,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{unknown,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{firstPass,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{timeSlot,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
